title: Brain-Controlled Wheelchair
detail: The next phase of human-computer interaction
extended_details:
With the EEG headset the team has, we aim to build a wheelchair which can be maneuvered by brain-wave.

Other than the EEG technologies, the project involves mechanical work to make the wheelchair move, speech recognition technologies to provide another way of interaction, a variety of sensors to ensure the safety of the wheelchair and other technologies so that the product can be smart and helpful.

parts_and_costs.part: Amazon.com: Arduino Uno R3 Microcontroller A000066: Computers & Access
